name: Fatal Sting
description:
Fatal Sting is a 1vs1, local multiplayer, fighting game where players learn about various species of venomous insects and arachnids on our planet by playing through their lens. Become the next Coyote Peterson as you learn about various species found in a range of environments, what they can do, and how they use their evolutionary traits to live through these brawls and fight another day. 

Fatal Sting provides quick, rapid-pace combat mechanics where players must avoid or block their opponent's fatal attack while also trying to land their own attacks. 

Players should use controllers for the best gameplay experience! The game works for Xbox, Playstation, Switch, and many other types of controllers. For "remote" local multiplayer experiences, download Parsec, a free remote desktop client that specializes in gaming, and allow your friends to connect to your computer from their own computers to play!

If there is anything that you would like to let us know about in terms of bugs, features, or just anything about the game in general, please comment on this page. We are happy to hear from you!

Fatal Sting was designed, programmed, and implemented by Justin Korn and Daniel Franco. The Art and UI/UX assets were created by the outstanding Naomi Tai. The amazing music was produced by Sander Holmsen Tolner and composed by Raphael Cintra Almeida, with the sound effects designed by Markel Badallo Latorre. Thank you all for making the game possible.
